location: Zhonghua Road Section 2, near Xiaonanmen MRT (557m) and Longshan Temple MRT (590m)
notes: Duplex unit (6F-7F) with 3BR/2LR/3BA, move-in ready with full furnishings and appliances. Pet-friendly with natural gas cooking. Baby safety concerns: duplex layout means internal stairs between floors which could be hazardous for toddlers. All rooms have windows suggesting good natural light. Convenient location with dual MRT access.
